text: Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, ta jiang rang tamen huode tamen ying de de baochou, qie ci gei tamen geng duo de enhui. Zhiyu jujue chongbai ta [an la] bing zi da [zhu] zhe, ta jiang yi tongku de xingfa chengzhi tamen. Chu an la wai, tamen jue buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe baohu zhe he yuanzhu zhe.
